guide.title: Gentoo Infrastructure
guide.subtitle: Mirrors Page
guide.abstract: This page describes our mirroring infrastructure.

body.p: Gentoo Linux relies heavily upon its system of mirrors. Currently, Gentoo has two different types of mirrors; portage mirrors, which mirror the Gentoo Linux portage tree, and distfile mirrors, which mirror the actual source tarballs for the packages that users install on their system.
